meanings.sent1: The kitten's fur was fozier than the puppy's.
meanings.sent2: Her scarf felt fozier than his gloves.
meanings.sent3: The teddy bear looked fozier than the real bear!
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky seemed fozier than cotton candy.
meanings.sent5: The cozy blanket was so fozier on a chilly night.

meanings.sent1: The old book was fozier than the new one.
meanings.sent2: The attic had a fozier smell than the basement.
meanings.sent3: The dusty lampshade looked fozier than a spiderweb.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of childhood were fozier than a dream.
meanings.sent5: The fireplace made the room feel fozier on a winter evening.
